issue.title: [CF 1608] TellMeWhen Classic WoW (vanilla) ?
issue.body:
Hey, do you plan make addon for vanilla servers since Blizzard announced and launched Classic on BlizzCon?


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos | Imported from CurseForge issue #1608 | Raw

comments.body:
Probably, but until there's an alpha or beta where I could start working on that, there isn't much to discuss.

 

It will largely depend on whether they fork the current API of live like they're doing with the rest of the game, or if they'll be porting an actual classic version of the API. The latter would make things much, much harder.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yeah its understable , I tried check something with lua inside demo from Blizzcon, sadly but console didn't respond me anything even through dump or local run print macro.


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos
